package.name: Horde_SyncMl
package.summary: Horde_SyncMl provides an API for processing SyncML requests
package.description: Classes for implementing a SyncML server.

release.notes: Passes all tests of SyncML conformance suite now.
Make the SyncML package independant from Horde, provide a new Sql backend as a reference implementation for a backend.
* First release candidate for Horde 4. * [jan] Fix calendar synchronization with certain Nokia phones (Bug #9646).
* First stable release for Horde 4. * [jan] Add removeMaps() method to Horde backend driver. * [jan] Convert database access to use Horde_Db.
* [mms] Fix issue causing slow syncs only (Bug #10008).
* [mms] Complete fix for issue causing slow syncs only (Bug #10008).
* [jan] Update Lithuanian translation. * [jan] Fix duplication of objects during synchronization (joniw@t-online.de, Bug #10081).
* [jan] Fix log level output in log file. * [jan] Update Latvian translation. * [mjr] Use the more efficient getChanges() API.
* [jan] Fix logging errors while retrieving server changes.
* [jan] Catch exceptions when changing or retrieving objects from the applications.
* [jan] Fix undefined method while synchronizing events with Funambol (Bug #10908).
* [jan] Don't corrupt binary data like images if sent in several messages (Jonathan Westerholt <joniw@t-online.de>, Bug #10864).
* First beta release for Horde 5. * [jan] Fix session handling (Bug #11242). * [jan] Fix finding locale directory if installed with PEAR.
